recommendation_sets.guideline_name: Not specified - Clinical information on lamellar ichthyosis

recommendations.action: topical treatment with skin barrier repair formulas containing ceramides or cholesterol, moisturizers with petrolatum or lanolin, and mild keratolytics containing alpha-hydroxy acids
recommendations.preferred: skin barrier repair formulas containing ceramides or cholesterol
recommendations.source_text: Lamellar ichthyosis is treated topically with skin barrier repair formulas containing ceramides or cholesterol, moisturizers with petrolatum or lanolin, and mild keratolytics (products containing alpha-hydroxy acids..

recommendations.action: systemic treatment with oral synthetic retinoids
recommendations.source_text: Severe lamellar ichthyosis can be treated systemically with oral synthetic retinoids. Retinoids are only used in severe cases of lamellar ichthyosis due to their known bone toxicity and other complications.
